trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Spokane
There were no other sightings in Spokane on or around October 5th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsSon was outside jumping on old mattresses. He laid down on the mattress and saw a light flash on a tree above him. He looked up and saw what looked like a beam from a star that was above him. He ran inside and said we need to turn the lights off so the aliens can't see us and find us. Dad said kitchen light had to be on, because he was cooking. Son went to room to get toy weapons in case the aliens came down.
Summary: star shone down in beam, lit up tree in blue light
